messages.subject: Japanese Blade from XVIII century for sale
messages.msgSnippet: I have a Japanese blade from XVIII century and I would like to sell it for the fee of $400. If someone is interested in such sword, please contact me. Kind
messages.messageBody:
I have a Japanese blade from XVIII century and I would like to sell it for the fee of $400. If someone is interested in such sword, please contact me.

Kind regards,
Pawel T. Nowak
Tomasnowak@...
